data-ui

Resources

Existing open source projects, demos, paid services, etc. that demonstrate approaches to editing & managing data through a user interface.

editors & transformation tools

  • OpenRefine – a free, open source power tool for working with messy data and improving it
  • flatsheet – realtime editor for curating data as a team

dat

  • dat – real-time replication and versioning for data sets
  • dat-editor – grid editor/viewer for dat

open source grid/spreadsheet editors

  • handsontable – a minimalist Excel-like data grid editor for HTML & JavaScript
  • datatables – Tables plug-in for jQuery
  • slickgrid – JavaScript grid/spreadsheet
  • Angular UI Grid – A data grid for AngularJS, part of the AngularUI suite
  • table-editor – a module for creating a very simple editor for tabular data

open source json editors

  • JSON Editor – takes a JSON Schema and uses it to generate an HTML form
  • jsoneditor – A web-based tool to view, edit and format JSON
  • json-ui – JSON editing with a friendly ui
  • hulk – an in-browser JSON editor
  • JSONedit – User friendly, visual JSON editor built as an AngularJS directive
  • FlexiJsonEditor – JSON editor as a jQuery plugin

data validation

  • json-schema – describes your JSON data format
  • is-my-json-valid – A JSONSchema validator that uses code generation to be extremely fast
  • jsonlint – A JSON parser and validator with a CLI

leveldb related

  • levelui – A GUI for LevelDB management based on atom-shell
  • superlevel – a minimalist cli utility for leveldb databases
  • lev – commandline tool and REPL for leveldb
  • level-json-edit – Taking editing json to the next level with multilevel

paid services for editing tabular data

  • airtable
  • fieldbook
  • smartsheet

misc. related tools/libraries

  • JSONSelect – CSS-like selectors for JSON
